Package AndeA1_2022

Class Hand

java.lang.Object
AndeA1_2022.Hand
public class Hand extends Object
Represents the current players hand of cards. It tracks five cards in the hand along with the amount of magic the player has, damage they will do for the turn and their health remaining.

Read the Assignment Class for Assignment Specification

Author:
YOURNAME AND STUDENT ID

    • Hand

      public Hand(Deck remainingCards)

      My solution length: 3 line
      Parameters:

  • Method Details

    • play

      public Card play(int cardNumber)
      Play a card
      This is the process of taking a card from your hand and putting it on the table. This method required to be completed to interact with the Game class

      When you play a card the following process is followed
      1. Increase energy by 20
      2. Check if the specified card number is valid (1-6) (return null on error)
      3. Check if there is enough energy to use the card (return null on error)
      4. Check if there are any more cards left in the deck (return null if out of cards)
      5. Reduce the energy by the appropriate amount
      6. Checks if the card increases the players damage or heals the players health
      7. Modified the players damage dealt or recovers their health (if a healing card is played, damage is set to 0) 8. Returns the played card to the caller
      9. Add a card to the hand
      My solution length: 18 line
      Parameters:
      cardNumber - the card to be played (valid range 1-6)
      Returns:
      The card removed from the deck (null if an error)

    • powerOfHand

      public int powerOfHand()
      The current power of the damage cards in the hand (Excluding any healing cards)

      Returns:
      the total value of all damage cards in hand

    • getStrongest

      public Card getStrongest()
      Get the highest value card from the hand. The card is removed from the hand. If there are two of equal value use the first one you find.

      My solution length: 1 line
      Returns:
      the strongest card in the deck. (Removing it from the hand).

    • getStrongest

      public Card getStrongest(int energy)
      Get the strongest card value that does not exceed the specified energy. The card is removed from the hand. If there are two of equal value use the first one you find.

      My solution length: 7 line
      Parameters:
      energy - the maximum energy that can be used.
      Returns:
      the strongest card in hand to a max of energy

    • getCard

      public Card getCard(int damage)
      Get the card that does the specified damage (or next greater) with the least energy used. The card is removed from the hand. If there are two of equal value use the first one you find.

      My solution length: 7 line
      Parameters:
      damage - damage requested
      Returns:
      the strongest card with the set damage for the least energy

    • toString

      public String toString()
      String representation of the cards in the hand. Should be in the form

      Hand [energy=100, health = 100 hand=
Card [name=Critical Slash, energyCost=30, valueDone=250, damage=true]
Card [name=Weak Punch, energyCost=5, valueDone=20, damage=true]
Card [name=Weak Punch, energyCost=5, valueDone=20, damage=true]
Card [name=Weak Punch, energyCost=5, valueDone=20, damage=true]
Card [name=Weak Punch, energyCost=5, valueDone=20, damage=true]

]
